name: Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War II - Retribution Eldar Race Pack
summary: Includes 4 unique ability and wargear items to equip your squad with.SPEAR OF THE YNNEAD: Attacks upon the enemy can now confuse them and cause them to attack each other. GUILE OF CEGORACH: The death of allied units now increases the chance of you entering an enraged state that increases your speed and damage.
